field.label: Delay time for popup appear
field.comment: With the delay option, you can set the time of appearance of the popup window. The value should be in milliseconds for example, 3000 for 3 seconds.

field.label: Show newsletter popup once
field.comment: You can either set the popup window to show once per page load by toggling this to true, or show the popup every time the condition is met by toggling this to false.
